Ministers.Name: Vlad Vladostovovitch
Ministers.Title: Minister of Energy
Ministers.Bio: Vlad came to power after his predecessor died in a mysterious nuclear accident.

Ministers.Name: General Aleksi Brutanov
Ministers.Title: Minister of War
Ministers.Bio: A loyal nationalist. Highly admired by his troops. They will follow him to the grave.

Ministers.Name: Valery Unchok
Ministers.Title: Minister of Justice
Ministers.Bio: Minister of Justice is a misnomer if ever their was one. His sole responsibility is to run the Secret Police.

Ministers.Name: Petya Belov
Ministers.Title: Minister of Finance
Ministers.Bio: From a long family of bankers. Rumor has it he has ties to the international banking community.

Ministers.Name: Gleb Tarasov
Ministers.Title: Minister of Transportation
Ministers.Bio: He makes the trains run on time, but is primarily famous for his use of slave labor to build infrastructure.
